about_the_game:
We are launching our Supporter DLC as we push out new content, levels, and more for Contagion.

The Supporter Pack includes:

  • The entire Contagion Comic in high quality

  • 13 Brand-New Phone Backgrounds

  • 8 Brand-New Ringtones

  • 8 Previously Exclusive Kickstarter Ringtones

  • 1 Brand-New Main Menu Music Track

  • Will receive a unique "Supporter" In-Game Icon added to your profile

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Windows® 8 32/64-bit / Windows® 10 32/64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 compatible video card with 256 MB, Shader model 2.0. ATI X800, NVidia 6600 or better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 10 GB HDD Space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Hardware: Mouse & Keyboard
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 32/64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 compatible video card with 512 MB, Shader model 3.0. ATI X1600, NVidia 7600 or better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 10 GB HDD Space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Hardware: Mouse & Keyboard
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet Connection

short_description: We are including brand-new cellphone backgrounds, ringtones, the previously exclusive "Kickstarter" ringtones, a unique in-game supporter identifier, and a brand-new main menu music track.
